news.title: Wind Turbines Drive Male Prairie Chickens Away From Mating Sites
news.summary: A study finds that wind turbines drive male prairie chickens away from mating sites, but don't seem to affect nesting habits. The post Wind Turbines Drive Male Prairie Chickens Away From Mating Sites appeared first on Environmental Monitor .

news.title: Vulnerable grassland birds abandon mating sites near wind turbines
